mods.abstract: Sadie McKee (Joan Crawford) is a cook's daughter and works a maid for the wealthy Alderson family. Although she flirts with her employer, Mike Alderson (Franchot Tone), she loves her humble boyfriend Tommy Wallace (Gene Raymond). The couple runs away to New York to get married, but before the ceremony Wallace meets a showgirl and deserts McKee. She decides to stay in the city, and gets a job in a nightclub owned by alcoholic millionaire Jack Brennan (Edward Arnold). Brennan is smitten with McKee, who eventually gives up on finding true love and marries Brennan for his money. She is unhappy, however, and leaves him when she finds out that Wallace is in trouble. With Alderson's help, she eventually discovers that he is extremely ill in a hospital. She goes to visit him, and he pair confess their love for each other shortly before Wallace dies.
